title: Radisson Hotel Group announces the opening of Park Inn by Radisson Ayodhya
description: Radisson said the hotel also provides amenities such as a swimming pool and a fully equipped gym for guests, besides a banquet hall. Vaibhav Kulkarni, General Manager, Park Inn by Radisson Ayodhya said the hotel would strive to provide not just a stay but a memorable journey for guests.
